rules_text:
Menace, Ward– Pay 3 life
When this creature attacks, discard two cards, then draw two cards. 
Sacrifice two lands: Until end of turn, each nonland card in your hand has madness. Their madness costs are equal to their mana cost.
notes:
Needs_Art

(If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
